meanings.sent1: The unletted man struggled to read the simple signs.
meanings.sent2: She felt unletted when she couldn't understand the instructions.
meanings.sent3: The unletted cat tried to read a book but got confused by the pictures.
meanings.sent4: His unletted mind was like a closed book, unable to grasp new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The unletted child looked at the words with confusion, unable to decipher them.

meanings.definition: Not marked or written upon; blank.
meanings.sent1: The unletted paper was perfect for drawing fresh pictures.
meanings.sent2: The unletted canvas awaited the artist's creative touch.
meanings.sent3: The unletted whiteboard was ready for new ideas to be written on it.
meanings.sent4: Her unletted notebook symbolized a new beginning, full of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The unletted page held the promise of a story waiting to be written.

meanings.sent1: The unletted apartment remained vacant for months.
meanings.sent2: The unletted house had no tenants interested in renting it.
meanings.sent3: The unletted office space seemed lonely without any occupants.
meanings.sent4: The unletted storefront awaited a new business to occupy it.
meanings.sent5: The unletted property stood silent, waiting for someone to claim it.
